int  ncomp

Reimplemented from Champ_Inc_base.

Definition at line 111 of file Champ_P0_PolyMAC.cpp.

References Domaine::coord_sommets(), Cout, Objet_U::dimension, Zone::domaine(), finl, Field_base::nb_compo_, Domaine::nb_som(), Champ_Inc_base::valeurs(), Zone_dis_base::zone(), and zone_dis_base().

{
  const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis = zone_dis_base();
  const Zone& zone = zone_dis.zone();
  const DoubleTab& coord=zone.domaine().coord_sommets();
  const int nb_som = zone.domaine().nb_som();
  const DoubleTab& val = valeurs();
  int som;
  os << nb_som << finl;
  for (som=0; som<nb_som; som++)
    {
      if (dimension==3)
        os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " << coord(som,2) << " " ;
      if (dimension==2)
        os << coord(som,0) << " " << coord(som,1) << " " ;
      if (nb_compo_ == 1)
        os << val(som) << finl;
      else
        os << val(som,ncomp) << finl;
    }
  os << finl;
  Cout << "Champ_P0_PolyMAC::imprime FIN >>>>>>>>>> " << finl;
  return 1;
}

  const Conds_lim& cls = ma_zone_cl_dis.valeur().les_conditions_limites();

        f = fvf.num_face(i), icl(f, 0) = idx, icl(f, 1) = n, icl(f, 2) = i;

}

DoubleTab & Champ_P0_PolyMAC::trace ( const Frontiere_dis_base &  ,
DoubleTab &  x,
double  tps,
int  distant 
) const [inline, virtual]

voir Champ_base
Cas particulier (malheureusement) du Champ_P0_VDF :
Si la frontiere est un raccord, le resultat est calcule sur le
raccord associe. Dans ce cas, le DoubleTab x doit etre
dimensionne sur le raccord associe.

Reimplemented from Champ_Inc_P0_base.

Definition at line 79 of file Champ_P0_PolyMAC.h.

References DoubleTab::dimension(), DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), Zone_VF::face_voisins(), DoubleTab::nb_dim(), Zone_dis_base::nb_elem_tot(), Zone_VF::nb_faces(), Front_VF::nb_faces(), Front_VF::num_face(), ref_cast, DoubleTab::resize(), Champ_Inc_base::valeurs(), and zone_dis_base().

{
  /* dimensionnement du tableau de destination x si necessaire */
  const DoubleTab& src = valeurs();
  const Front_VF& fvf = ref_cast(Front_VF, fr);
  const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC, zone_dis_base());
  const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins();

  DoubleTrav dst; //reconstruction du champ aux faces (on ne le remplit que sur le bord concerne)
  int i, n, e, f, N = src.nb_dim() > 1 ? src.dimension(1): 1, has_faces = src.dimension_tot(0) > zone.nb_elem_tot();
  if (!x.dimension(0) && !x.get_md_vector().non_nul()) x.resize(fvf.nb_faces(), N);
  N > 1 ? dst.resize(zone.nb_faces(), N) : dst.resize(zone.nb_faces()); //aargh
  for (i = 0; i < fvf.nb_faces(); i++) for (n = 0, f = fvf.num_face(i), e = f_e(f, 0); n < N; n++)
      dst(f, n) = src(has_faces ? zone.nb_elem_tot() + f : e, n);

  if (distant) fr.frontiere().trace_face_distant(dst, x);
  else fr.frontiere().trace_face_local(dst, x);

  return x;
}
DoubleTab & Champ_P0_PolyMAC::valeur_aux_faces ( DoubleTab &  result) const [virtual]

renvoie la valeur du champ aux faces

Reimplemented from Champ_base.

Definition at line 177 of file Champ_P0_PolyMAC.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension(), DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), Zone_VF::face_voisins(), DoubleTab::nb_dim(), Zone_dis_base::nb_elem_tot(), Zone_VF::premiere_face_int(), ref_cast, Champ_Inc_base::valeurs(), Zone_VF::xv(), and zone_dis_base().

{
  const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC, zone_dis_base());
  const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins();
  const DoubleTab& src = valeurs();

  /* vals doit etre pre-dimensionne */
  int i, e, f, n, N = (src.nb_dim() == 1 ? 1 : src.dimension(1));
  assert(dst.dimension(0) == zone.xv().dimension(0) && N == (dst.nb_dim() == 1 ? 1 : dst.dimension(1)));

  if (src.dimension_tot(0) > zone.nb_elem_tot()) //on a les valeurs aux faces
    for (f = 0; f < dst.dimension(0); f++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++) dst(f, n) = src(zone.nb_elem_tot() + f, n);
  else for (f = 0; f < dst.dimension(0); f++) //on prend (amont + aval) / 2
      for (i = 0; i < 2 && (e = f_e(f, i)) >= 0; i++) for (n = 0; n < N; n++)
          dst(f, n) += src(e, n) * (f < zone.premiere_face_int() ? 1 : 0.5);

  return dst;
}
